item.title: Fourier Transform
item.description: Almost Fourier Transform It is important to see there are 2 different frequencies here: The frequency of the original signal The frequency with which the little rotating vector winds around the circle Different patterns appear as we wind up this graph, but it is clear that the x-coordinate for the center of mass is important when the winding frequency is 3; The same number as the original signal

item.title: Random Signal Basic
item.description: What is Random Signals 随机信号(Random Signals)在任何时间的取值都是不能先验确定的随机变量 虽然随机信号的取值不能先验确定，但这些取值却服从某种统计规律，换言之，随机信号或过程可以用概率分布特性统计地描述 随机变量 $X=x(t)$，离散状态为随机序列 $x(n)$,$x_k(n)$是随机序列$x(n)$的一个样本序列 统计量 $$ \mu_x(n)=E{x(n)}=\lim_{N\rightarrow\infty}\frac{1}{N}\sum_{k=1}^N x_k(n) $$

item.title: What is dB
item.description: dB is short for decibel, which is a unit that indicates ratio or gain. It is often used to measure sound intensity, signal strength, attenuation and other quantities.
